long: Meaning: to "call out to" (i.e. properly, address by name, but used in a wide variety of applications).  Usage: bewray (self), that are bidden, call (for, forth, self, upon), cry (unto), (be) famous, guest, invite, mention, (give) name, preach, (make) proclaim(-ation), pronounce, publish, read, renowned, say.  Source: a primitive root (rather identical with "H7122" through the idea of accosting a person met);
